channel.title: Login on 2 accounts in same world!
channel.description:
Ok theres 2 ways to do this. U need a pretty good computer for the first one. i dont know about the second.
Difficulty: 1 (know how to read)
Steps: 1: Turn on 2 browsers
2. On one of them go to a runescape world like u normaly would
3. On the second one go to runescape.com then on the details page scroll down and where u select the java thing select the bottom one.
[IMG]http://i92.photobucket.com/albums/l14/russiandude212/ScreenShot.jpg[/img]
4. Then click low detail and select the same world as the other browser.
5. Log in on both and play ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ If the guide above doesnt work for you, do it this way.
Difficulty: 2 (need to be fast with the mouse)
1. Turn on 2 browsers
2. Go to the same worlds (dont change anything on the details page)
3. Ok now put the browsers side by side
4. Insert your username and pass on both of them (DONT LOG IN YET!)
[IMG]http://i92.photobucket.com/albums/l14/russiandude212/ScreenShot-1.jpg[/img]
5. Ok now really fast click login on both the browsers
6. You should be able to log in.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ YOU KNOW HOW TO SAY THANKS!

item.title: Login on 2 accounts in same world!

item.description:
@kurt wrote:

lawl, i do this all the time to trade things from my main to pker.

We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.[/center][/quote]

item.title: Login on 2 accounts in same world!
item.dc:creator: @russiandude212 russiandude212
item.description:
@russiandude212 wrote:

Ok theres 2 ways to do this. U need a pretty good computer for the first one. i dont know about the second.

Difficulty: 1 (know how to read)

Steps:
1: Turn on 2 browsers

  1. On one of them go to a runescape world like u normaly would

  2. On the second one go to runescape.com then on the details page scroll down and where u select the java thing select the bottom one.

ScreenShot.jpg800×640

  1. Then click low detail and select the same world as the other browser.

  2. Log in on both and play

If the guide above doesnt work for you, do it this way.

Difficulty: 2 (need to be fast with the mouse)

1. Turn on 2 browsers

2. Go to the same worlds (dont change anything on the details page)

3. Ok now put the browsers side by side

4. Insert your username and pass on both of them (DONT LOG IN YET!)

[IMG]http://i92.photobucket.com/albums/l14/russiandude212/ScreenShot-1.jpg[/img]

5. Ok now really fast click login on both the browsers

6. You should be able to log in.

YOU KNOW HOW TO SAY THANKS!
